Package ball.upnp.ssdp

Classes specific to Simple Service Discovery Protocol 1.0 (SSDP).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SSDPDiscoveryService.Listener
    SSDPDiscoveryService listener interface definition.
    SSDPMessage
    SSDP HttpMessage interface definition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SSDPDiscoveryCache
    SSDP discovery cache implementation.
    SSDPDiscoveryService
    SSDP discovery ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor implementation.
    SSDPDiscoveryService.RequestHandler
    SSDPDiscoveryService SSDPRequest handler.
    SSDPDiscoveryService.ResponseHandler
    SSDPDiscoveryService SSDPResponse handler.
    SSDPMulticastSocket
    SSDP discovery MulticastSocket implementation.
    SSDPRequest
    SSDP HttpRequest implementation.
    SSDPResponse
    SSDP HttpResponse implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SSDPRequest.Method
    SSDPRequest enumerated SSDPRequest.Methods.
